attributes.action: Let Afghans awarded Chevening Scholarships come to the UK
attributes.additional_details: These people have been told they can’t come to the UK this year for “administrative reasons”. How is this kind?
attributes.background: Allow those Afghans awarded Chevening Scholarships the right to come to the UK immediately

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594938
